basics.name: Russelene Flores
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai'i. I expect to graduate in May, 2025.

work.summary: My role involves diagnosing and resolving technical issues across software, hardware, and network systems. I provide comprehensive technical support through various communication channels, document findings and solutions meticulously, and perform on-site services such as equipment configuration, server maintenance, and software installations, all while adhering to detailed documentation aligned with organizational standards.
As an operator, I analyzed incoming emergency signals, promptly notified clients of these signals, and provided basic technical assistance related to their alarm systems.

I managed store operations to maintain operational efficiency and adherence to company standards, overseeing scheduling, training, inventory management, quality assurance inspections. Additionally, I assisted in strategy development to improve profitability
